Name: Bomb House Ooccoo Softlock
Description: Map glitch + bombhouse + ooccoo = softlock, somehow

Name: Bomb House Skip
Description: Delay hitting the cutscene trigger, allowing Link to kill a bug early, which despawns the Bomb house

Name: Rutella Warp
Description: Walk away from Rutella while she is guiding Link to warp to her. This is technically not a glitch.

Name: Basement Bug Manip
Description: Perform a series of actions to quickly grab the bugs

Name: Malo Mart Bug Manip
Description: Perform a bonk to manipulate the bug into coming to Link

Name: NaN Coords
Description: Leave Malo Mart as Wolf Link, causing Link's coordinates to glitch out. The game is expecting human Link to do a door open animation, which Wolf Link cannot do. Sometimes Link voids, sometimes he does not.

Name: Kak Twilight Gate Escape (Superjump)
Description: Bypass the Kakariko Village gate in Twilight with a super jump to escape early. No known uses.

Name: Twilight Fence Escape (Transform Clip)
Description: Transform clip passed the Twilight fence enclosure

Name: Barns OOB
Description: Glitch out Barne's "switch booth" event by transforming from Wolf Link into Human link, causing Barnes to keep sidestepping until he goes out of bounds.

Name: Glitchy Epona Taming as Wolf Link
Description: Start the Epona Taming cutscene as Wolf Link (requires having done Early Master Sword)

Name: Early City in the Sky (Transform)
Description: Clip behind a statue, gaining access to the broken cannon early. Skips Temple of Time and most of Snowpeak. Note: Requires use of "Map Warp Restriction Cancelling" to warp the gannon.

Name: Early City in the Sky (LJA)
Description: Long jump attack through the statue to unlock city in the sky early.

Name: Early City in the Sky (No Map Warping)
Description: NOTE: This can only be done after completing Temple of Time, as otherwise Shad does not appear in the basement. Savewarp / deathwarp out of the cannon room after talking to Midna about the cannon, you can talk to Shad to warp back into the room while also disabling the trigger that stops you from warping the cannon.

Name: Wooden Statue Without Zora Armor Crash
Description: Turning in the wood statue without Zora armor causes a game flags situation where there would be two Renados, causing the game to crash

Name: Rupee Bed Clip
Description: Somehow clipped into the bed after getting yellow rupee

Name: [Wii 1.0] Cannon Room Save Glitch
Description: If you save in the room under Kakariko Sanctuary before warping out the Sky Cannon, you’ll be stuck on reload. Midna refuses to warp it since the NPC (Shad) hasn’t left, and there’s no way out – an irreparable bug on original Wii releases​

Name: Melted Postman
Description: Triggering postman below the map causes link to fall to nearly -1 billion units, losing floating precision for the rendering on Link and the Postman

Name: Postman Falls Off Cliff
Description: Trigger the postman in a specific spot to get him to run off a cliff

Name: Eldin Field OOB / Double Load Crash
Description: Jump strike to get out of bounds, then void out, then this leads can lead to a crash from double loading the area.

Name: [Wii?] Early Heart Piece via Clawshot
Description: Use an extremely precise clawshot to access the heart piece area without the use of bomb arrows.

Name: [Cross-Post] Back in Time Wrong Ooccoo Coordinates
Description: Use Ooccoo after back in time without watching the cutscene, and Link will respawn at the wrong coordinates

Name: [Cross-Post] Back in Time Stick Link
Description: Use Ooccoo after back in time without watching the cutscene, and Link will respawn at the wrong coordinates, but spawn inside water causing Link's animations to corrupt turning into a vertical line.

Name: Glitchy King Bulbin 1 as Wolf
Description: Causes severe cutscene glitches

Name: Vanishing Pulled Items
Description: Pulled items can disappear, similar to what happens in Garudo Desert Mesa.

Name: Gorge Skip
Description: Frame-perfect A press to skip a forced warp and save time.

Name: Rupee Roll
Description: Cross the Gorge without needing the bridge.
External Links / Additional Notes: See primary source for alternate methods

Name: Warp Into Void
Description: ? Not sure of steps. Warping to Gorge gets enabled, but bridge stays behind somehow.

Name: Gorge Cave Clip
Description: Get OOB by jumping into a wall

Name: Epona Gorge Cross
Description: Cross the Gorge with Epona after doing BiTE

Name: Enemy Drowns on Land
Description: Lure enemy off a cliff above water, and it drowns in the air

Name: Dominion Rod Superjump
Description: Superjump to get to 100 rupee chest on ledge as wolf link.

Name: Eldin Twilight Well Clip
Description: Jump into the side of the well as human Link to enter it early.

Name: Rutella Tunnel Warp
Description: Backpedal while Rutella's spirit is guiding link to the Zora armor to warp forward

Name: Death Mountain Cutscene Trigger Skip
Description: Bypass the twilight loading trigger and hit the normal load trigger, skipping the intro cutscene.

Name: Goron Wrestle Escape
Description: Precise movement to escape the event before the wrestling begins

Name: Goron Wrestle Camera Soft-Lock
Description: Roll into the Goron guarding the mountain entrance. In a 1 frame window before the wrestle event starts, roll forward again and then equip iron boots. Throw him, and the camera should soft-lock, and the event will not be considered complete.

Name: [Wii?] Goron Limbo (3rd person C-Up)
Description: Camera glitch to view Link in 3rd person while using C-up controls.

Name: Black meteor cutscene
Description: Activate senses in a 1 frame window. The cutscene will not properly clear senses, causing the cutscene to play out in darkness.

Name: Goron Mines Early (Text Displacement)
Description: Use Text Displacement to skip the wrestling required to enter Goron Mines

Name: Goron Mines Early (Spinner Clip)
Description: Clip passed the guards using a spinner. Requires Early Master Sword.

Name: Goron Mines Early (Roll Clip)
Description: Roll passed the left guard by rolling into him at a specific angle.

Name: Goron Mines Early Elevator
Description: Use OOB navigation to access the elevator early, then use a spinner to bypass the elevator guard.

Name: [TAS, Cross-Post] Goron Mines Early via Wolf Digs
Description: Frame perfectly chain Wolf Link digs to bypass the colliders on the NPCs blocking goron mines.

Name: Super Jump OOB
Description: Super jump a kargarok to get OOB

Name: Third Flame Jet Skip
Description: Use a long jump attack to skip the third flame jet in the dungeon.

Name: Magnet Skip
Description: Skip activating magnet in outdoor area with a long jump attack.

Name: Pipe Jump
Description: Technically not a glitch. Jump off of a pipe instead of going through the area as intended.

Name: [Wii] Magnetic Ceiling Without Iron Boots
Description: ? What are the steps

Name: [Wii?] Magnetic Ceiling Jumpstrike Slide
Description: Jumpstrike into the ground to wall transition on a magnetic floor to continue to slide forward in a glitchy way.

Name: Magnetic Wall OOB
Description: Equip iron boots and jump attack into a magnetic wall to clip through it to get OOB. Can also fall into some water and swim OOB for a bit.

Name: Kitty Climb
Description: Glitch into the steel beam geometry with faulty collision, and climb up through it to access a room early.

Name: Fast Platform Cycle
Description: Glitchy jump into a moving platform to make a quick cycle

Name: Key Shard Skip
Description: Jump from atop the rotating platform to gain access to the top of the room early.

Name: Dangoro Lava Skip
Description: Throw Dangoro on the very edge of the platform as its tilted downward. He will die without drowning, and immediately kick into his exit dialogue. Afterwards, he will do a glitchy glide into the lava (after combat is entirely done) and you can L-Target him to gain extremely far camera angles.

Name: [HD] Quick Transform Dangoro Clip
Description: Performing a quick transform (HD only) causes Dangoro to fall through the floor and take damage immediately

Name: [HD] Dangoro Softlock
Description: Quick transform with Iron Boots directly after landing to softlock the fight. Wolf Link can only move by attacking in this state.

Name: Dangoro EBF Pause Manip
Description: Unpausing seems to be able to change how EBF countdowns work

Name: Fyrus Fast Cycles
Description: Grabbing the chain as it is blown away allows for rapidly retrying cycles.

Name: Ooccoo Slide Pot Push skipping rope bridge
Description: Us Ooccoo pot slide glitch to gain a boosted jump across the gap to bypass the rope bridge.

Name: Transform in Hidden Village
Description: Stand in a precise location to transform back into Human Link

Name: Early Hidden Village (Hidden Skills)
Description: Get to hidden village early using a variety of special skills on terrain

Name: Early Hidden Village (Epona Seam Clip)
Description: Get to hidden village early via Epona Seam Clipping
